name: create_pr_from_staged_changes
description: A composite tool that stages all local changes, commits them with a provided message, pushes them to a new branch, and opens a GitHub pull request. Use this for the complete, end-to-end final step of a development task.

commit_message.description: The full commit message for the changes, which should follow the Conventional Commits standard.

branch_name.description: The name of the new feature branch to be created and pushed, e.g., 'feature/JIRA-123-new-endpoint'.

pr_title.description: The title for the pull request to be created on GitHub.

pr_body.description: The markdown content for the body of the pull request.
